## Description {#details}

Configuration for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager">Manager</a> class.

This stores configurations from both users and vendors and is passed to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager">Manager</a> upon construction. (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> changes to the config after the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager">Manager</a>&#39;s construction will not have any effect on it).

This struct can be extended as needed to add additional configuration points specific to a vendor&#39;s implementation.

Definition at line 66 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/telemetry/telemetry-h">Telemetry.h</a>.
